overview: From 2025-10-10 to 2025-10-11, elizaos/eliza had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 2 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Testing & Verification
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: Add integration tests for initialization, reloads, and propagation of edits to characters, plugins, and configs.

topIssues.title: Observability & Resilience
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Add metrics hooks (active agent counts, memory usage, runtime stats).
* Provide standardized error surfaces for runtime crashes (eliminate silent failures).

topIssues.title: Runtime Access & Introspection
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Add always-available, read-only runtime accessor.
* Implement runtime hot-reload (reload agent configs without full restart).
* Add runtime introspection tools (listServices(), listProviders()).

topIssues.title: Project Management
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Implement ElizaOS.loadProject(data) for editable projects.
* Replace “magical CLI loaders” with explicit, programmatic project loading.

topIssues.title: Runtime Cleanup
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: Simplify runtime internals and make state accessible programmatically.
